category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 8 (Safety and Health Organization)
contents: Article 8 (Safety and Health Organization) ① The Corporation’s safety and health management organization is the same as the safety and health management organization chart in Annex Table 1. Revised December 22, 2021, ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall grant the safety and health organization the authority and responsibility necessary to perform its duties, and shall support the human and material resources necessary for the performance of its duties, such as facilities, equipment, and budget.
